description:
A monk saves a girl from an evil monster. Flowers hide logs. The buddha`s forehead shines.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shippei Tarou / A Field of Rape Blossoms That Bloomed Overnight / The Light on the Buddha`s Forehead
Shippei Tarou / Ichiya de Saita Na no Hanabatake / Hotoke-sama no Hitai no Hikari
しっぺい太郎 / 一夜で咲いた菜の花畑 / 仏さまのひたいの光
